aboutUsIntroDev: We, Olivia and Renat, are passionate developers who took on the challenge of creating a powerful and user-friendly real-time chat application. With our experience in web and software development, we successfully brought this project from concept to implementation. Our goal was to build a modern, fast, and secure communication platform.
aboutUsIntroApp: Our real-time chat application is built on the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). By utilizing cutting-edge technologies and best practices, we developed a robust and scalable architecture.
aboutUsUsedTechnologiesFrontend: Frontend: React with Vite for an optimized development environment, Zustand for state management, and Tailwind CSS/React-hot-toast for an appealing UI design.
aboutUsUsedTechnologiesBackend: Backend: Express.js as the web framework for Node.js, MongoDB as the NoSQL database, bcrypt for password encryption, and Express-session for secure authentication.
aboutUsUsedTechnologiesSocket: Real-time Communication: Socket.io enables smooth real-time messaging.
aboutUsUsedTechnologiesClaudinary: Cloud Integration: Cloudinary is used for storing and managing images.
aboutUsAppFeaturesRegister: Our application allows users to register, log in, and communicate in real-time.
aboutUsAppFeaturesUI: Modern user interface, optimized for both desktop and mobile devices
aboutUsAppFeaturesAuth: User registration and login with secure authentication
aboutUsFeedback: We appreciate feedback and suggestions and warmly invite developers to contribute to the further development of the app!
existChatroomNameRequired: you have to type a username.
existChatroomTaostErrorDeletedUser: You cannot send messages to a deleted user!
